body.name: Feihe 19 Inch TV, LED Widescreen TV with Digital ATSC Tuners HDMI/VGA/RCA/USB, 19 Inch Flat Screen TV w/Built in Dual Speakers for Kitchen and RV Camper(2023 Model)

features: ☀ Powerful Compatibility: 19 inch TV flat screen comes with a lot of compatibility features including: Built in USB Interface, ATSC Tuner（ready 1080p,720p,480p）, 12V DC Power Supply, AV,VGA and HDMI Inputs, Headphone Jack.Supports MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 3, MPEG4, AVC, MP4, FLV, MKV, MP3, JPEG and 3GP to make your work easy and entertain your party more than usual.

☀ Bundle of Features: 12 volt TV has potential features for you to not settle for less. HDMI、VGA and USB inputs are connected with external audio and video playback. AV input is there to use with DVD players or Game Systems. Built in speaker for party while Headphone Jack is for private viewing, in addition, ATSC Tuner and Remote Control make this a potential move TV.

☀ Endless Connectivity: Computer,DVR, WIFI Box ,DVD players and of course gaming consoles. You can also connect your monitor to the computer host that will allow you to use your small TV as a computer monitor.

☀ Home & RV TV: Kitchen TV is designed specifically to make your small and compact area in the house quite useful. You can enjoy watching your favorite shows and a lot more without worrying of putting this under cabinet tv at a special dedicated place. This kitchen tv is enough to be a good companion of yours, while you’re on the go in a truck, on RV camping or even if you have a tight kitchen space for your tv.

☀ Unique Remote Control: Control your TV with one remote control with clear every button function, very easy to use.(Note: Because the remote control code is different，19 inch TV is not compatible with Xfinity/Direct tv/Comcast /Verizon remotes.Require user to have Two remote controls to operate TV.)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Q: Does work with a Comcast/Cable/Verizon/Xfinity/Spectrum/Fios remote? A: You have to use two remotes; Use the Feihe remote for volume countries and to turn it off. Use your Comcast/Cable/Verizon/Xfinity/Spectrum/Fios remote control for everything else,the network providers do not recognize the manufacturer.Model number of TV was not able to be found. Q: How to use the antenna with Feihe 19 inch tv? A: It all depends on your local reception and where the TV is located in the house（Closer to the window works better）in order to pick up a signal. Use an indoor antenna, but only receive several channels if you live close to mountains and have poor reception without a dish or cable. Other areas, with an antenna are more successful. When the signal is strong the picture is good! Q：TV not compatible with our cable TV provider? A: First: The cable box needs to support the CEC function Second: Then the cable box should be set to open the CEC function Third: TV under HDMI channel, select MENU->OPTION->HDMI CEC->Select the last DeviceList, search for CEC support Search for the channel, then use Feihe's remote control to remote control the TV box. Q: What if the TV speaker does not work, the screen is broken (or Black / Blue Vertical Line), or the remote control does not work? A: Please contact the seller in time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nice picture quality very good Tv small and perfect

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No Closed Caption or independent audio out.
reviews.reviewText: I could not get Closed Captioning to work and gave it a 1 star which I now change to 4.. I've discovered the problem. In trying to program my cable remote to the TV (unsuccessfully) I apparently reset my cable box to captions off. Captions now work.Also, the audio out jack cannot be controlled via the menu. if plugged in for our hearing impaired viewer, sound is cut for all others. An optional audio out like an optical connector would be nice to have.I, too, had trouble with the remote. The remote cover does not hold the batteries very snugly and they lose contact. I added a filler inside the cover to provide a more secure fit.The manual says an AV cable is "supplied" though it is not list ed as "in the box" and I received none.I found the sound from this TV to be a bit louder than the Sanyo it replaced and it works well in my kitchen environment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent small TV, poor audio quality
reviews.reviewText: This is a decent little TV with nice picture quality. Alas, the audio quality is about the worst I’ve heard. It sounds like my 1977 Emerson AM clock radio - hollow and all midrange. Doesn’t matter which audio profile you use. I had a little Sharp panel from 10 years ago with far better stereo audio. Also, you apparently cannot get a Fire stick remote to control the TV volume and power, which means using two remotes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Every time you change the channel, you need to re-select the English language
reviews.reviewText: I went many rounds of email conversation with their tech support people over the descriptive audio always being present, or football games always switching to Spanish. The language barrier was obvious, I finally figured out that the TV defaults to the secondary audio every time you change the channel, regardless of what settings you make in the 'setup' and 'options' and 'sound' menus. So if you're not blind, and you are an English speaker, you will need to re-select English from the 'Audio' button any time you are watching network programming from an off-air antenna. Also, the channel number button layout on the remote is unique, to say the least. I can still use this unit in my RV, but too inconvenient in my kitchen, I will buy a different on for in there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful TV. Great buy for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I liked it but plan on adding a sound bar
reviews.reviewText: Installed in my Motorhome. Picture quality is very good. Sound quality is very bad. I simply added a 12 volt sound bar connected to the TV earphone jack. Sound quality is much improved. Considering that I only paid about $40 for sound bar, still a very good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: TV and cable remote will not work with out using the remote that came with TV

reviews.reviewTitle: facile a installé, très bien pensé, pleins de possibilités de branchement. Je recommande!
